TopicTitle: What will be the first thing you will do in 0.23?

Articles.Content:
This thread is kind of a tradition now.

0.17 - land on all the planets!

0.18 - launch probes and dock!

0.19 - put a rover on the Mun!

0.20 - launch jeb on top of a SRB!

0.21 - hire people and admire the new buildings!

0.22 - scientific subassemblies!

And you know what? IT IS TIME.

What is the first thing you will do after updating?

Oh, and please don't post things like "start up the game" or "make a new save".

Edited January 5, 2014 by astropapi1
Hopefully have fun and not be dissapointed, then remind myself resources were cancelled.
Start a new career game.
Try building a better SSTO with the Sabre engine, hopefully it's not disappointing in power.
Put a science lab in orbit
Break the game -__-

Build an SSTO spaceplane using the RAPIER engines.

Hopefully have fun and not be dissapointed, then remind myself resources were cancelled.

They were postponed, not canceled.

Edit: Never mind, I just watched the live stream. It's a shame but not that big of a deal.

Edited December 15, 2013 by nettcod

1. Attempt tweaking of every part

2. Fly around with the SABRE for at least 1.5hr

3. Launch a station and put a lab on it

SCIENCE

... then them Tweakables

If I need to do career mode again, I'll do it, if not, then I'll probably first place an itsy bitsy satellite on the border of Kerbin's SOI and then start building a large orbital station resembling ISS, with science modules and empty tanks.
Make my SSTO sabre-powered 1-ton lifter stock.

Probably gonna build some kind of VASIMR powered (from near future pack) research vessel with the new lab module, with one or two small landers, and go on a tour of any and all low gravity worlds I haven't done science on yet. After that... I'll probably have my tech tree maxed.

Must to test my mods...

Career mode is just not the same with out Remote tech. after getting the mods rigged up time to move onto over tunning the Kerbin Planetary system with pillow forts... I mean baes and space stations (dammit Jeb stop playing with the mic)

Alacrity Fitzhugh

I am going to construct my space station, complete with a snack lab (science lab). This will be used to refuel my tug and lander system and do crew changes, oh and of course make snacks in space. Yeah I know I do not need the lab, but it just looks like an interesting idea for a part of the station that I could not leave out.
Wait till Firespitter gets a 0.23 update, then fly a propeller plane for fun.
I think I might take a plane out for a spin to see how the taxiing of steerable gear works and how well the ocean lag has been beaten.
I'll probably try and build an SSTO with RAPIERS and work on a Munar space station.
Load and launch the AEIA Mk8.

strap jeb to a SRB give him some science stuff and yell Ã‚Â¡Ã‚Â¡Ã‚Â¡SCIENCE!!! (Like the last time on .22)

And...

On 30th December (My Birthday) I will repeat.... ON MY NEW COMPUTER (actually a Laptop, and my second computer on my life).

1) Make sure my save file survived

2) Check if the magic boulder has been re-added (done via checking for a "Magic Boulder: Orbit Started" Line)

3a) Go the the Magic Boulder (if re-added)

3b) Play around with the new feutures

4) See how good a SABRE SSTO is

Probably go:

!!!CIENCIO!!! with the labs, and I am assuming there will be new experiments (yay)

Also trash all my saves, which I do quite often. Then I will install the mods that have updated. Woot.
Starting monitoring the forums for mod updates...
I'm going to mess with empty fuel tanks and thrust limiting.
Wait until all the realism mods are updated and then start a new career with MedievalNerd's tech tree.
Wait about a week or two for all of my favorite mods to get updated
